signup_page.name: your full name *
signup_page.userNotCreated: User was not created, it might exist already.

pageBase.reservationsHint: Here you have list of all reservations within your client account.
pageBase.newReservationHint: You can make a new reservation here. Please, first select user and the garage, then dates and eventually pick parking place. Voil√°.
pageBase.garagesHint: Here is a list of all garages registered within your client account. When selected you can edit details or manage which parking places of the garage are assigned to which client account.
pageBase.newGarageHint: Create new garage. Set the name and details, then follow by defining the floors and Parking places. Two input options are available. You can load each floorplan in form of SVG image with information about Parking places. (We can help you to create this floorplan - see our website for more information) Second option is to define range of number for each level.
pageBase.garageClientsHint: Here you can manage which Parking  places are assigned to which Client account within selected garage. Just select Client account to see the plan of the garage and available places. Be aware garage might have more levels. Select desired level by the buttons on the right side.
pageBase.clientsHint: In this section you can manage Client accounts. Client account is a unit that gathers information about the client, its users, parking places they are allowed to use and such. Select an account to show action buttons for "edit" and "manage users"
pageBase.newClientHint: Here you are creating a new Client account. Client account is a unit that gathers information about the client, its users, parking places they are allowed to use and such. You will be able to set these in corresponding sections of the system.
pageBase.clientUsersHint: This section allows for management of users of a particular Client account. By selecting a user you can see and setup user rights. You can as well invite new users to this selected Client account. Sent invitations, that are waiting for the confirmation are shown in the "Pending invitations" Section below
pageBase.settingsHint: In this Settings section you are able to set your own preferences. Set your desired language. Switch on and off visbility of these blue boxes with help thru all application.
pageBase.usersHint: Here you have a list of all known users. Select a user to see Client accounts membership.
pageBase.editClientHint: Here you can edit Client account details and its name.
pageBase.notificationsHint: Here are displayed all notifications that need to be resolved.
pageBase.inviteUsersHint: Invite new user to connect with selected Client Account. Please provide E-mail and send the invitation. After user accepts the invitation, he or she becomes automatically member of the selected Client Account.
pageBase.addFeaturesHint: Here you can add functionality to your system. TODO: add features hint
pageBase.newAccountHint: Here you can create new account that will store your money. TODO: new account hint
pageBase.editAccountHint: Account properties editation. TODO: edit account hint
pageBase.accountsHint: Here you can see all your account. TODO: accounts hint
pageBase.carUsersHint: Here you can manage people using the cars. TODO: user car hint
pageBase.newCarHint: Here you can create new car. Creating new reservation will be easier than. TODO: new car hint
pageBase.editCarHint: Here you can edit car properties. TODO: edit car hint
pageBase.carsHint: This is list of all cars assigned to you.+ TODO: cars hint
pageBase.garageMarketingHint: Here you can manage marketing for your garage. TODO: Change this
pageBase.garageNewMarketingHint: Here you can setup new marketing. TODO: Change this
pageBase.garageEditMarketingHint: Here you can manage edit marketing. TODO: Change this
pageBase.garageNewPricingHint: Here you can set up new reservations pricing. TODO: New pricing Hint
pageBase.garageEditPricingHint: Here you can edit pricing properties. TODO: Edit pricing hint
pageBase.garageNewRentHint: Here you can set up new rent for your places. TODO: New rent hint
pageBase.garageEditRentHint: Now you can edit rent properties. TODO: Edit rent hint
pageBase.garageAddClientHint: Here you can add client to garage managemat page. TODO: add client to management hint
pageBase.garageGarageUsersHint: Here you can manage who can manage your garage. TODO: Garage users management
pageBase.EditUserHint: Here it is possible to change information about yourself.

orderGarageModule.garageModuleDescription: Garage modules will allow you to automatically open garage gate for your customers.
orderGarageModule.equalAddresses: Invoice address is equal to shipping address

newGarage.placePriorityDescription: Here you can set priority of your places. Places that you select first will have higher priority. Not selected places will have default priority and will not be prefered.
newGarage.orderOwnLayout: Do you want to look this profesional? Order layout of your own garage! We will send you an email with instructions.
newGarage.orderLayout: I want to order own layout!
newGarage.betterTarifMarketing: With this tarif you cannot offer your places to the public. Select Automation & Access tarif and earn money for parking!
newGarage.name: Garage name *
newGarage.gsmModulesDescription: GSM modules will allow you to automatically open gate for your guests. The price is %(price)s per piece.
newGarage.removeFloorRowQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete this floor?
newGarage.removeGateRowQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete this gate?
newGarage.placeNoGate: Not all places were assigned to gate. This can be changed later in garage management.

newAccount.name: Account name *
newAccount.CSOBnotValid: Private key and Merchant id pair is not valid.
newAccount.permissionNotGranted: Paypals permission to process payment on your behalf was not granted. Try again.
newAccount.start: Start by selecting what kind of payment method would you prefer. If you would like us to implement another payment method, please contact Park-it-direct support.
newAccount.merchantDesc: We use Paypal to take care of your money. If you want to accept money, you have to your own Paypal business account and provide us permission to process payments for you. Got to paypal.com and sign up business account! Once you got your business Paypal account we can continue with this form.
newAccount.merchantDesc2: Fill the form and click OK. You will be automatically redirected to paypals website where you log in to paypal you want to use with this Park-it-direct account. Than just click "Grant Permission" button.
newAccount.csobMerchantDesc: To use ƒåSOB payment gateway, you first have to visit your local ƒåSOB branch office, they will provide you with new merchant id identifier and private key. For more information contact ƒåSOB support.
newAccount.csobMerchantDesc2: If you already have your identifiers, please enter merchant id and upload your private key from *.pub file.
newAccount.merchantUpdateDesc: After clicking OK, you will be redirected to the paypal. To change your current paypal account, simply log in with another paypal account and click the "Grant Permission" button.
newAccount.merchantUpdateCsobDesc: To change your current ƒåSOB account, simply provide us with new merchant id and private key.
newAccount.paypalPayment: Paypal selected - you will be redirected afther clicking OK.
